name: Twitter - Disable User Tweeting
description:
This style disables the Tweet box at the top of the page and the tweet box that usually appears when a tweet is expanded to see comments.  It is useful if one does not want to tweet by mistake when searching for other content on the site.  It is a very simple hack.

If you like to tweet, then this is not for you. :)
additional_info:
Version 1.0 --12/31/2011
Simply add this style and the tweet box will disappear.
Credits are due to Webb and srazzano for helping me fix my code on the forum.

Version 1.1 -- 12/15/2012
Twitter had a slight style change to their site.  Removed !important keyword.

Version 2.0 -- 1/17/2015
Additionally disabled tweet box when a tweet is expanded.

Version 2.1 -- 8/7/2016
Disabled red tweet button on top menubar
